base_description: Gray, rectangular, modern-style object with geometric design.
part_description: Features two black circular elements, one central rectangular part, and a large gray back panel. The circles are symmetrically placed on either side of the rectangle, which is centered on the panel.
internal_interaction_description: The central rectangular part protrudes from the back panel, providing structural support. The black circular elements are likely attached to the panel, possibly serving as decorative or functional components. The arrangement suggests a balanced design, with each part contributing to the overall stability and aesthetics of the object.
external_interaction_description: This object may interact with external elements by being mounted on a surface, serving as a decorative or functional piece. Its geometric design could complement modern interiors. It may also interact with light, casting shadows or reflecting light off its surfaces, enhancing its visual appeal.
